name: Moon Dust (digits0801, Orinji Neko)
description:
You play as a girl who has sworn to look at no other than herself so as to not disturb them. For this reason she wanders with her eyes shut, truly only knowing how she looks like herself.

One day a moon angel fell from the sky and asked her for help in exchange for a path the Heaven. Follow her brief trial as she makes it there.

The game is controller compatible.

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move

F to interact

Esc is pause

F11 is fullscreen

Sound/Music/Pixel Art Assets: Orinji Neko

Programmer, 3d art: Digits0801

Font: Silkscreen by Jason Kottke
